author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

While reviewing #33000 I noticed some hardcoded FEDID number for GEM's was introduced.
I did not want to delay further the merging of that PR, which contained a fix needed for the D76 Phase2 Geometry. 
Hardcoded ID's may give rise to errors in case of possible future updates/additions to the GEM mapping. 
Therefore, I'm preparing now this simple patch, which names somehow the starting point for the GE0 and GE21 FEDID's.

@jshlee @watson-ij please let me know if you agree with it: if not, I will close this (otherwise trivial) PR

#### PR validation:

It builds
title: Get rid of hardcoded GEM fedid's
